basics.summary: I am currently a Junior studying Mechanical Engineering at the University of Hawai'i at Mānoa

education.institution: University of Hawai'i at Mānoa, Honolulu, HI

highlights: Create meaningful connections with the customer to ease the process of buying $1,000+ Ukuleles
Shot and edited a free ad for the store’s social media page that promoted the company’s overgoal within the ukulele industry
Teach the students music to play during the basketball games to increase school spirit
Take orders and create the drinks in a timely mannered
Prepare ingredients for the current and next shift and maintain a clean work environment
Pack and deliver orders to customers quickly and efficiently

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
